sentences.en: A sable is a small animal with beautiful dark fur.
sentences.cn: 黑貂是长有美丽黑色软毛的小动物.

sentences.en: Artists'brushes are sometimes made of sable.
sentences.cn: 画家的画笔有的是用貂毛制的.

sentences.en: Colour Sable, Sable and white, Tricolour and Blue Merle.
sentences.cn: 颜色黑貂色, 黑貂色与白色,三色, 芸石色.

sentences.en: Colour Sable, Sable and white, Tricolour and Merle.
sentences.cn: 黑貂色, 黑貂色与白色,三色, 芸石色.

sentences.en: Down the sable flood they glided.
sentences.cn: 他们在黑黝黝的洪水中随波逐流.

sentences.en: How can I determine a dachshund has the sable pattern?
sentences.cn: 我该如何确定这一只腊肠是否有黑毛尾花色?

sentences.en: I was silly to get out in the cold without my sable coat.
sentences.cn: 我真傻,大冷天没穿我那紫貂皮大衣就出门了.

sentences.en: Last night you looked so fabulous in that wonderful full - length sable coat.
sentences.cn: 昨天晚上你穿的那件黑貂皮大衣实在是太完美了.

sentences.en: One parent must be a sablea sable pup.
sentences.cn: 如果要繁殖黑毛尾的小狗,她的父母其中一只必须是黑毛尾的.

sentences.en: Phylis : Where does she keep my sable coat?
sentences.cn: 我的貂皮大衣她放在哪?

sentences.en: Sable is perhaps the most difficult pattern to describe.
sentences.cn: 黑毛尾(注)也许是最难以描素的.

sentences.en: Show me some sable, will you?
sentences.cn: 给我拿紫貂皮的好 吗 ?

sentences.en: The term sable describes not a coat colour, but a pattern.
sentences.cn: “貂色”一词描述的并不是一种毛色, 而是一种样式.

sentences.en: This is a sable and white bluie.
sentences.cn: 这是貂色和白色间蓝色.

sentences.en: When winter snows upon thy sable hairs.
sentences.cn: 一旦冬雪掩上你秀发的乌黑.

trans.tran_cn: 紫貂，紫貂皮，阴暗的，暗夜
trans.tran_en: an expensive fur used to make coats etc, or the small animal that this fur comes from
